ResourceHeader.ResourceName: SMART H-alpha movies of representative solar prominence eruptions and flares
ResourceHeader.Description: Solar chromospheric movies of representative solar prominence and filament eruptions and flares obtained around H-alpha absorption line with the SMART telescope at Hida Observatory.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Kwasan and Hida Observatories, Kyoto University

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: The use of data for public education efforts and non-commercial purposes is encouraged. If you want to use the data in a published paper, book, or any other kind of (electronic) publication, please contact us.

DisplayData.Keyword: Sun, Chromosphere, Halpha, Flare, Filament, Prominence, eruption, Moreton wave
